text: John Barnett Rambo (August 9, 1943 â€“ January 8, 2022) was an American professional basketball player and high jumper. He won a bronze medal in the 1964 Summer Olympics in Tokyo.John Rambo . Sports-reference.com. Rambo was born in Atlanta, Texas. Rambo died on January 8, 2022 from a heart attack in Paramount, California at the age of 78. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American track and field athletes Category:American basketball players Category:Olympic bronze medalists for the United States Category:Sportspeople from Texas Category:Sportspeople from California Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction
title: John Rambo (athlete)
